Package restaurant

Interface MenuList

All Known Implementing Classes:
Category, MenuBundle, Order
public interface MenuList
The MenuList interface defines a set of methods to accesss the classes which contain multiple menu items. i.e. Order and Category.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type

    Description

    Adds a component as child.

  • Method Details

    • getChild

      MenuItem getChild​(int index)
      Returns a child component.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the component to be returned.
      Returns:
      The indexed component.

    • getChildrenCount

      int getChildrenCount()
      Returns the number of children in the menu.
      Returns:
      The number of children in the menu.

    • addChild

      void addChild​(MenuItem child)
      Adds a component as child.
      Parameters:
      child - The component to be added as a child.

    • removeChild

      void removeChild​(int index)
      Removes a child component by index. Does nothing if the index is out of range.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the component to be removed.

    • contains

      int contains​(int itemCode)
      Search child components given an item code. Returns the index in the menu if exists and -1 otherwise.
      Parameters:
      itemCode - The item code to search for.
      Returns:
      The index in the menu if exists and -1 otherwise.

    • contains

      MenuItem contains​(MenuItem mi)
      Search child components given a component. Returns the identical component in the menu if exists and null otherwise.
      Parameters:
      mi - The component to search for.
      Returns:
      The identical component in the menu if exists and null otherwise.
